title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 257.2 - Voluntary interest arbitration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 257.2 - Voluntary interest arbitration

State Regulations
(a) In the event that an employer and a labor
organization agree to submit any unresolved issue in bargaining to interest
arbitration, they may jointly request the assistance of the board in providing
for such arbitration by a letter directed to the director of
conciliation. (b) The written
request shall be accompanied by a copy of the submission. (c) An arbitrator shall be designated
pursuant to the selection process established by the director of conciliation, which process will give the parties an opportunity to participate in the
selection of the arbitrator. Notes

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
